content: It doesn’t matter that Trump’s son-in-law is Jewish or that his daughter converted to Judaism. He IS an anti-semetic and it is clearly obvious to anyone with a working brain that his neo-nazi fascist-racist beliefs effect his policy statements, how he treats people, and handles situations involving Jewish people. Jared Kushner is a sellout to his people and his family which includes a grandmother who was a concentration camp survivor. Trump’s daughter is an insult to Jewish people and her husband because instead of calling out her father’s obvious dislike for Jewish people, she wants her husband to accommodate an anti-semetic father-in-law. That is outrageous and cowardly. Jews need to stop trying to accommodate Trump because he makes statements favorable to Israel. I understand that the maintenance of this country is very important to them for many reasons. But Trump is a con artist AND a set up artist. He is going to get people killed and cause more warfare/ bloodshed between the Palestinians and the Israelis. Jews need to forge their OWN political path independent of Trump. he cannot be trusted and their cause will ultimately suffer.
